name: Daily Lessons Learned
body:
#Chronicling of my daily lessons learned

This site will chronicle my daily lessons learned to help improve my performance but also give me a sense of self worth and pride when looking back on what I've done.

##### Jan 16th:
Daily Tasks:
* I started working on moving the logic that I built for the filtered errors report from the model to the script.

Lessons Learned:
* Design - First from the controller, then model, and now to a background job script

##### Jan 17th:
Daily Tasks:
* I had to tackle the check_subscription script which was painful.  I had to go into an old code base and figure out what it was doing and insert my logic in there.
* I had to refactor it because the approach I took created excess code and inefficiencies.

Lessons Learned:
* I need to learn more about fixtures
* I used debugger and I need to learn more about that
* Iâ€™m getting used to git and github more and more
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
